entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of rain or snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain with periods of snow early this evening and with drizzle late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain ending in the morning then 40 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon.
